snippet: The Intelligence Group is merging with Noise, a company that specializes in the millennial market, and a unit of Barkley that researches millennials is being spun off as a separate consultancy named FutureCast.
abstract: Advertising column examines two deals that highlight the surging importance of big data and database marketing; notes that the Intelligence Group, division of the Creative Artists Agency, will be combined with Noise, specialist in the young-adult market; also notes that a unit dedicated to research into millennial market at Barkley will be spun off into a separate consultancy called FutureCast.
lead_paragraph: The Intelligence Group is merging with Noise, a company that specializes in the millennial market, and a unit of Barkley that researches millennials is being spun off as a separate consultancy named FutureCast.

headline.main: 2 Deals Focus on Big Data and Youth
headline.print_headline: 2 Deals Focus on Big Data and Youth
